5001.name: A Long Tunnel
5001.description: You encounter some rapids as you enter this tunnel cut out of the mountains by the river.

west.description: There appear to be some bars here, making passage to the west difficult.

5004.name: A Tunnel Intersection
5004.description: The tunnel branches off to the north and south.

5005.name: An Underground Lake
5005.description: You are floating on a jet-black underground lake fed by dripping water and lime from above.  The tunnel continues to the east and the river leads back west.  Leading upwards to the northwest is a roughly hewn hallway.

5006.name: A Long Narrow Tunnel
5006.description: The tunnel rises sharply to the east.  Another narrow tunnel leads away to the north.

5007.name: A Wide Tunnel
5007.description: The tunnel continues east and west.  To the east the tunnel dives down into a bright light.  A small passage way opens to the north.

5008.name: The Cave-In
5008.description: You stand at the edge of a large pile of rubble created from the last rockslide.

down.description: You can easily slide down the rocks without getting hurt.

5009.name: At The Foot Of The Rubble
5009.description: You are at the bottom of a large pile of rubble.  A tunnel branches off to the north and east.

5010.name: A Cave Entrance
5010.description: You stand in the middle of a large and beautiful cave.  A path leads deeper into the darkness.

down.description: You look down into the cave.  Bones are strewn about everywhere.

5011.name: A Giant Cave
5011.description: This cavern overwhelms you.  The walls and ceiling seem miles away. Bones of previous adventurers lie strewn on the cavern floor.  There is a passage that spirals downwards in the northeast corner of the cavern.

down.description: The passageway spirals down into the gloom.

5012.name: A Narrow Bend
5012.description: The tunnel turns to the south and west.

5013.name: A Large Cave
5013.description: You are standing in a large cave.  Many furs are spread out on the floor.

5014.name: A Damp Hallway
5014.description: The walls here are extremely damp, as well as the floor.

east.description: You hear drops of water.

5015.name: An Underground Pool
5015.description: You are wading in a knee deep pool of lime-water.

5016.name: A Damp Hallway
5016.description: The walls of the tunnel are extremely damp here.  The tunnel leads sharply upwards to the south as it starts to get narrow.

west.description: You hear drops of water.

5017.name: A Narrow Crawlway
5017.description: This crawlway is just big enough for a human to crawl through or a halfling to walk through.

south.description: You smell the fragrant odor of fungus.

5018.name: A Large Cavern
5018.description: You have entered a very large cavern.  The rock formations would amaze almost any dwarf.

5019.name: A Fungus Patch
5019.description: As you walk through the fungus patch, you are shot at by many millions of spores.  You can hardly breathe.

east.description: The fragrant smell of fungus spores continues to the east.

5020.name: The Fungus Path
5020.description: As you walk along the path, millions of spores are shot at you.  It is difficult to breathe.

south.description: A giant mushroom temple stands to the south.

west.description: The fragrant smell of spores continues to the west.

5021.name: The Fungus Temple
5021.description: You find yourself standing inside of a giant mushroom.  The inside is decorated in the fashion of a temple.

5022.name: A Sloping Passage
5022.description: You follow a path sloping down from the fungus temple.

5023.name: A Sloping Passage
5023.description: You are on a path that gently slopes up from the underground pool.

north.description: You hear sounds of trickling water.

5024.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5024.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.  A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the  west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5025.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5025.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the  west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5026.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5026.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.  The hole which you tumbled out of is too high for you to reach.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5027.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5027.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5028.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5028.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north-east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.  You spy a narrow dirt trail leading away to the west into the foothills.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: A small dirt trail leads off to the west where it joins a large clay road some distance away.

5029.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5029.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north-east and a snow-capped mountain range to the west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5030.name: A Small Oasis
5030.description: You stand beside a small pool of crystal-blue water bathed in the shade of a few scarce palm trees.  To the north you see a small encampment stopped for the day.

north.description: You see three tents and some camels hitched to a stake.  Shadows moving  across the tents suggest activity.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5031.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5031.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5032.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5032.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5033.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5033.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north-east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5034.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5034.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the south-east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5035.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5035.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the east, it looks enormous, even from this distance.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the east.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5036.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5036.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north-east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5037.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5037.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north-east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5038.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5038.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the south.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5039.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5039.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around you.  A pyramid lies to the south.  The gates of a city lie a short distance off to the north.

north.description: Some city gates stand off to the north.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5040.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5040.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  You are standing near a gigantic pyramid located a couple hundred meters west of you.  From here you can sense the great evil which resides within the massive structure.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: The pyramid can be seen across the sands to the west.

5041.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5041.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north.

north.description: Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the north.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5042.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5042.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5043.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5043.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5044.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5044.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north and a ruined city to the west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5045.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5045.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the south.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5046.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5046.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the south-west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5047.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5047.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Even from here, you can sense a great evil residing within the pyramid protruding from the sand to the west.

5048.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5048.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5049.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5049.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north-west.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5050.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5050.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see... and a pyramid in the distance.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5051.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5051.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the south-west and a deep canyon to the east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5052.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5052.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the south-west and a deep canyon to the east.  Just below you can make out a tiny ledge.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5053.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5053.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the west and a deep canyon to the east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: A rickety rope bridge stretches across the canyon... it doesn't look too safe.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5054.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5054.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the west and a deep canyon to the east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5055.name: The Great Eastern Desert
5055.description: A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around   you.  A pyramid lies to the north-west and a deep canyon to the east.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5056.name: A Nomad Camp
5056.description: This small group of desert nomads has stopped for the day to rest and refresh themselves beside this beautiful oasis.  Three tents and some camels make up the party.  From within two of the tents you hear muffled voices, obviously surprised at your visit.

north.description: Some camels are tied up to a mass of stakes plugged into the ground.

east.description: You see inside one of the tents a huddled mass of people, probably slaves.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5057.name: Inside A Small Tent
5057.description: This is a small and simple tent with few possessions in sight.  Lying here and there are young-looking men and women, possibly slaves to the leader of this band.

west.description: You see the center of the nomad camp.

5058.name: Beside The Camels
5058.description: Here stand about ten camels, all hitched to some stakes plugged into  the ground.  To the east you see a small tent while to the north you see a  larger, fancier tent.

north.description: This tent seems to be the temporary abode of the nomad leader.  You make a mental note to visit it before you leave.

east.description: In this tent there are very large men, all carrying weapons.

south.description: You see the center of the nomad camp.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

5059.name: The Warriors' Tent
5059.description: This tent has a few furnishings, but mainly it holds the band's  protectors.  They all stare at you coldly as you enter.

west.description: Outside you see some peaceful camels.

5060.name: The Main Tent
5060.description: This tent is as lavishly decorated on the inside as it is on the outside.  A fancy carpet lies on the sand and numerous baskets line the walls.

south.description: You see some peaceful camels.

5061.name: The Main Tent
5061.description: This is where the leader of this band of nomads resides.  He is  definitely rich as you inspect the tapestries, baskets, and a few paintings as well.

west.description: You see the entrance to this tent.

5062.name: The Rickety Rope Bridge
5062.description: You carefully begin to walk across the bridge, but suddenly the rope breaks and you fall...                      ... and fall                             and fall                                and fall                                     ... to your death on the rocks below.

5063.name: The Wind-Swept Ledge
5063.description: Being very careful not to lose your balance, you look around and find that this canyon is about a half a kilometer deep.  To the west is a dark cave leading under the desert sands and above you a rope bridge spans the gap.

up.description: The desert sands blow down in your face.

5064.name: The Cave Mouth
5064.description: The air in here is MUCH cooler than outside.  From the west you hear  strange sounds, but can see nothing.  The cave slopes down into the  darkness.

east.description: Outside is lighter and very windy.

5065.name: The Mysterious Lair
5065.description: You have stumbled upon the home of something.  From the treasure haphazardly strewn about and the rotting carcasses, you would guess that this is a dragon's lair.  As to what type, you can't really say. The cave narrows out into a tunnel to the west. To the north, a treacherous mountain path climbs toward distant peaks wreathed in smoke.

north.description: A dangerous mountain path leads upward toward smoke-wreathed peaks - the Dragon's Domain.

5066.name: A Wide Tunnel
5066.description: This tunnel seems to go on forever into the darkness.  You carefully feel your way along the walls.

5067.name: A Narrower Tunnel
5067.description: The tunnel becomes very narrow and you fight to squeeze your way through. The floor seems to level off a little.

5068.name: A Narrow Crack
5068.description: This part of the tunnel is the hardest to move through as the walls move in to meet you.

5069.name: A Small Cavern
5069.description: It is dark and damp and bats hang from the ceiling.  A narrow crack is in the east wall.  The floor now slopes upwards.

5070.name: A Small Shaft
5070.description: From within this shaft you can see a narrow hole in the roof just large enough for one person.  Back east is the cavern.

5000.name: dervish
5000.long_desc: A raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.
5000.description: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use some rest.

5001.name: dervish
5001.long_desc: A large dervish watches for signs of trouble.
5001.description:
Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use LOTS of
rest.

5002.name: snake
5002.long_desc: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.
5002.description:
This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow
and black.

5003.name: scorpion
5003.long_desc: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.
5003.description: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.

5004.name: worm
5004.long_desc: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!
5004.description: He's big, mean, and purple.  Watch out!

5005.name: dragon
5005.long_desc: A very large brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello.'
5005.description: Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

5006.name: nomad
5006.long_desc: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.
5006.description:
He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side is a large,
engraved cutlass.  He has an especially haughty air about him.

5007.name: nomad
5007.long_desc: The nomad commander stands here staring at you suspiciously.
5007.description:
This is the nomad leader's second in command.  His clothes are richly woven
of silk and gold thread.  A nasty cutlass hangs at his side.

5008.name: nomad
5008.long_desc: A proud nomad warrior stands here.
5008.description: This warrior is dressed in typical nomad clothing and looks quite mean.

5009.name: slave
5009.long_desc: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.
5009.description: She looks quite thin and weak.

5010.name: dracolich
5010.long_desc: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
5010.description:
The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it.
Obviously it no longer fears death.

5011.name: drider
5011.long_desc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
5011.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

5012.name: duergar
5012.long_desc: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.
5012.description:
The duergar could probably crush your head as easily as he does those
rocks.

5013.name: myconoid
5013.description:
The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably has the
same effect).

5014.name: myconoid
5014.long_desc: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.
5014.description: The shaman shoots spores into the air.

5015.name: dustdigger
5015.long_desc: A small oasis invites you to dive in.
5015.description:
Looking a little closer at this oasis, you begin to wonder why
it seems to be moving about...

5017.name: camel
5017.long_desc: A very dangerous creature, a camel, snorts at you.
5017.description:
It is advisable not to mess with this creature.  After all, you
have heard many a horror story about experiences with camels.
Bad experiences.

5000.name: pick
5000.room_desc: A small mining pick made of what appears to be silver lies on the ground.

5002.name: halberd
5002.room_desc: A mighty halberd lies against the wall.

5003.name: amulet
5003.room_desc: A mushroom-shaped amulet lies on the ground.

5005.name: bone
5005.room_desc: A large leg bone rests on the ground.

5006.name: cactus
5006.room_desc: A small cactus cup lies on the ground.

5007.name: basket
5007.room_desc: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

5009.name: basket
5009.room_desc: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

5010.name: basket
5010.room_desc: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

5011.name: rope
5011.room_desc: A long coil of rope lies on the ground.

5012.name: stakes
5012.room_desc: A small bundle of stakes lies here.

5013.name: map
5013.room_desc: An old, tattered, and much faded map lies here.

5014.name: turban
5014.room_desc: A thick padded turban lies here.

5015.name: coins
5015.room_desc: A great, gleaming pile of treasure lies at your feet.

5016.name: sabre
5016.room_desc: A long, curved sabre stands upright in the ground.

5017.name: scimitar
5017.room_desc: A curved scimitar lies at your feet.

5018.name: cutlass
5018.room_desc: A long, pointed cutlass lies here.

5021.name: bow
5021.room_desc: A powerful golden bow lies here.

5022.name: scroll
5022.room_desc: An encrypted scroll lies at your feet.

5023.name: chest
5023.room_desc: An iron bound chest with a shiny lock sits here.

5024.name: key
5024.room_desc: A shiny golden key lies here.

5025.name: bracelet
5025.room_desc: A tarnished copper bracelet lies at your feet.

5026.name: ruby
5026.room_desc: A large ruby lies on the ground, collecting dust.

5027.name: diamond
5027.room_desc: A glittering diamond lies at your feet.

5028.name: sapphire
5028.room_desc: A brilliant sapphire lies here, twinkling happily.

5029.name: lapis
5029.room_desc: A deep blue lapis lazuli gem lies here.

5030.name: jewel
5030.room_desc: The Tiger Jewel lies here blazing.

5031.name: jewel
5031.room_desc: The red-eyed jewel glares at you greedily.

5032.name: emerald
5032.room_desc: A fiery green emerald sits here.
